name: ISOPUR UV STABILIZER
description: Isopur UV STABILIZER offer UV stabilization in the following options as a pure UV stabilizer solution. It is added to the polyol component. The stabilizer solution can be added to both colored and non-colored systems in order to delay the yellowing process. As a UV-stabilizing color paste. It is added to the polyol component via the color paste. This procedure saves adding another component to the system. The prerequisite is that the dosage of the color paste is constant so that the same amount of stabilizer is added. A deviation from the correct addition amount of the stabilizer can lead to a serious loss of effectiveness.
